Rolling Stab.name: Rolling Stab
Rolling Stab.flavor: As your foe strikes you, you roll to the side to make a punishing counterstrike.
Rolling Stab.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Rolling Stab.effect: Before your attack, shift 5 squares to any square adjacent to the target.
Rolling Stab.attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. AC
Rolling Stab.onHit: 1[W] + Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier damage, and you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. If the target is a dragon, this attack deals an extra 1[W] damage.

Heartstrike.name: Heartstrike
Heartstrike.flavor: Your foe recoils from your attack in agony, but your pursuit of justice brings you implacably after it.
Heartstrike.attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. AC
Heartstrike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier damage, you slide the target 3 squares and shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to the target, and the target is marked until the end of the encounter.
Heartstrike.onMiss: Half damage and the target is marked until the end of the encounter.
Heartstrike.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Rousing Cry.name: Rousing Cry
Rousing Cry.flavor: You voice is a clarion, cutting through the confusion to stir your ally to action.
Rousing Cry.target: One dazed or stunned ally in the burst that you can see
Rousing Cry.effect: The dazed or stunned condition ends and the target can take a move action as a free action.

Platinum Mantle.name: Platinum Mantle
Platinum Mantle.flavor: Destructive power washes around you, but Bahamut protects you and those who trust you.
Platinum Mantle.channelDivinity: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter.
Platinum Mantle.trigger: You are hit by a close or area attack
Platinum Mantle.target: You and each ally in the burst
Platinum Mantle.effect: The target gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
